Plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
Title: Pretty in Pink
Actors: Molly Ringwald, Harry Dean Stanton, Jon Cryer, Annie Potts
tomatoConsensus: Molly Ringwald gives an outstanding performance in this sweet, intelligent teen comedy that takes an ancient premise and injects it with insight and wit.
